56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Urwa from Usama bin Zaid:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) rode a donkey on which there was a saddle covered by a velvet sheet and let Usama ride behind him (on the donkey)

chapter.eng-name: The sitting of two men together on a donkey
